Imports (epimodel.imports)¶

Countermeasures (epimodel.imports.countermeasures)¶

Functions

import_countermeasures_csv(rds, path)

Imports countermeasures data from a csv file (e.g.
epimodel.imports.countermeasures.import_countermeasures_csv(rds: epimodel.regions.RegionDataset, path)¶

Imports countermeasures data from a csv file (e.g. https://github.com/epidemics/epimodel-covid-data/blob/master/sources/simplified_countermeasures_2020_03_28.csv) into a pandas DataFrame.

Parameters

  • rds (epimodel.regions.RegionDataset) – RegionDataset to process region names

  • path (str) – Path to the CSV file

Returns

pandas.DataFrame –

Index:

MultiIndex (code, date)

Columns:

Countermeasure columns from the CSV

Foretold (epimodel.imports.foretold)¶

Functions

fetch_foretold(channel_id)

Fetch the data from foretold.io.

import_foretold(rds, foretold_channel)

Imports data from foretold.io into a pandas DataFrame.
epimodel.imports.foretold.fetch_foretold(channel_id: str) → bytes¶

Fetch the data from foretold.io.

Parameters

  • channel_id – Channel id (UUID)

  • output_path – If set, writes into the path. (not implemented)

Returns

None if written to a file; parsed JSON if output_path not set.

epimodel.imports.foretold.import_foretold(rds: epimodel.regions.RegionDataset, foretold_channel: str)¶

Imports data from foretold.io into a pandas DataFrame.

Parameters

  • rds – The RegionDataset to get region data from

  • foretold_channel – The foretold channel ID (UUID)

Returns

pandas.DataFrame –

Columns:

  • Name: Code

  • Name: Date

  • Name: Mean

  • Name: Variance

  • Quantile columns (names 0.01, 0.02 … 1.00)

Johns Hopkins (epimodel.imports.johns_hopkins)¶

Functions

import_johns_hopkins(rds[, prefix])

Read a DataFrame of Johns Hopkins data from given directory or URL.
epimodel.imports.johns_hopkins.import_johns_hopkins(rds: epimodel.regions.RegionDataset, prefix=None)¶

Read a DataFrame of Johns Hopkins data from given directory or URL.

By default loads data from CSSE github.

Parameters

  • rds (epimodel.regions.RegionDataset) – RegionDataset to process region names

  • prefix (str, optional) – Path to the directory containing Johns Hopkins CSV files. If None, then the following prefix will be used: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19/master/csse_covid_19_data/csse_covid_19_time_series/

Returns

pandas.DataFrame –

Index:

MultiIndex (Code, date)

Columns:

  • Name: Recovered (NaN for US states)

  • Name: Confirmed

  • Name: Deaths

  • Name: Active (NaN for US states)
